The following is a calendar of lesbian, gay, bisexual, and transgender (LGBT) events. This mainly comprises pride parades but also includes other kinds of events such as sporting events and film festivals. They range in size from the world's largest pride parade in São Paulo with 3.5 million participants to the world's smallest pride parade with 100 participants in the city of Sligo, Ireland.
